metadata.title: CVE-2015-8313 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
GnuTLS incorrectly validates the first byte of padding in CBC modes

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.0.11+really2.12.23-12ubuntu2.3
libgnutls-openssl27 - 2.12.23-12ubuntu2.3
libgnutls26 - 2.12.23-12ubuntu2.3
libgnutlsxx27 - 2.12.23-12ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls26 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.23-12ubuntu2.3').
gnutls26 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.23-12ubuntu2.3').
